data.name: nvim__buf_redraw_range
data.description: TODO: Documentation

data.name: nvim__buf_stats
data.description: TODO: Documentation

data.name: nvim_buf_add_highlight
data.description:
{col_end})
                Adds a highlight to buffer.

data.name: nvim_buf_attach
data.description:
Activates buffer-update events on a channel, or as Lua
                callbacks.

data.name: nvim_buf_call
data.description: call a function with buffer as temporary current buffer

data.name: nvim_buf_clear_namespace
data.description:
Clears namespaced objects (highlights, extmarks, virtual text)
                from a region.

data.name: nvim_buf_del_extmark
data.description: Removes an extmark.

data.name: nvim_buf_del_keymap
data.description: Unmaps a buffer-local |mapping| for the given mode.

data.name: nvim_buf_del_var
data.description: Removes a buffer-scoped (b:) variable

data.name: nvim_buf_delete
data.description: Deletes the buffer. See |:bwipeout|

data.name: nvim_buf_detach
data.description: Deactivates buffer-update events on the channel.

data.name: nvim_buf_get_changedtick
data.description: Gets a changed tick of a buffer

data.name: nvim_buf_get_commands
data.description: Gets a map of buffer-local |user-commands|.

data.name: nvim_buf_get_extmark_by_id
data.description: Returns position for a given extmark id

data.name: nvim_buf_get_extmarks
data.description:
Gets extmarks in "traversal order" from a |charwise| region
                defined by buffer positions (inclusive, 0-indexed
                |api-indexing|).

data.name: nvim_buf_get_keymap
data.description: Gets a list of buffer-local |mapping| definitions.

data.name: nvim_buf_get_lines
data.description: Gets a line-range from the buffer.

data.name: nvim_buf_get_mark
data.description:
Return a tuple (row,col) representing the position of the
                named mark.

data.name: nvim_buf_get_name
data.description: Gets the full file name for the buffer

data.name: nvim_buf_get_offset
data.description: Returns the byte offset of a line (0-indexed). |api-indexing|

data.name: nvim_buf_get_option
data.description: Gets a buffer option value

data.name: nvim_buf_get_var
data.description: Gets a buffer-scoped (b:) variable.

data.name: nvim_buf_is_loaded
data.description:
Checks if a buffer is valid and loaded. See |api-buffer| for
                more info about unloaded buffers.

data.name: nvim_buf_is_valid
data.description: Checks if a buffer is valid.

data.name: nvim_buf_line_count
data.description: Gets the buffer line count

data.name: nvim_buf_set_extmark
data.description: Creates or updates an extmark.

data.name: nvim_buf_set_keymap
data.description: Sets a buffer-local |mapping| for the given mode.

data.name: nvim_buf_set_lines
data.description: Sets (replaces) a line-range in the buffer.

data.name: nvim_buf_set_name
data.description: Sets the full file name for a buffer

data.name: nvim_buf_set_option
data.description:
Sets a buffer option value. Passing 'nil' as value deletes the
                option (only works if there's a global fallback)

data.name: nvim_buf_set_text
data.description:
{replacement})
                Sets (replaces) a range in the buffer

data.name: nvim_buf_set_var
data.description: Sets a buffer-scoped (b:) variable

data.name: nvim_buf_set_virtual_text
data.description: Set the virtual text (annotation) for a buffer line.
